notFound.title: Are you lost?
notFound.description:
The scenario you are looking for does not exist.
The branch of the story may have ended here, or it hasn't grown yet.

topics.newShortStory: New Short Story by Favorite Author Released

about.title: About Gaji

whatIsGaji.title: What does "Gaji" mean? üåø
whatIsGaji.description: "Gaji" (Í∞ÄÏßÄ) is the Korean word for "branch". Just as a tree grows many branches, each story can branch into countless directions based on your choices and conversations. Our platform embodies this concept, allowing you to create unique narrative branches as you interact with literary characters, explore different scenarios, and discover new perspectives within classic stories.

about.subtitle: Bridging the gap between classic literature and modern technology, Gaji brings beloved characters to life through AI-powered conversations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make classic literature accessible, engaging, and interactive for modern readers through innovative AI technology.

preserve.title: Preserve Literature
preserve.description: By making classic literature appealing to be experienced by new generations in ways that resonate with modern audiences.

community.title: Build Community
community.description: Create a space for readers through shared conversations with characters, fostering discussions about themes, motivations, and interpretations.

enhance.title: Enhance Understanding
enhance.description: Deepen comprehension by engaging directly with characters, exploring their motivations, and asking questions about their worlds.

innovate.title: Innovate Education
innovate.description: Provide educators and students with powerful tools to explore literature in creative and personalized ways that fosters deeper learning.

step1.label: STEP 1
step1.title: Search for a Character
step1.description: Use our search bar to find characters from your favorite books. We have hundreds of characters from classic literature ready to chat.

step2.label: STEP 2
step2.title: Start a Conversation
step2.description: Begin chatting with the character in real-time. Ask questions, explore their motivations, or discuss themes from their story.

step3.label: STEP 3
step3.title: Fork and Explore
step3.description: Create branches in your conversation to explore different topics. Each fork preserves the conversation history at that point.

step4.label: STEP 4
step4.title: Share Your Insights
step4.description: Share favorite conversations with friends, classmates, or book clubs. Export conversations for essays or study materials.
